page.title: 01Introduction to the area.
page.content: Our area contains within its boundaries aspects of{industrial}and {urban development}both{ancient and {modern. Travelling from the site of Heworth a {medieval village}through{Aycliffe {Village},to the{new town of Newton Aycliffe is like a journey through time. The industrial estate,on the site of a wartime munitions factory,is separated from the houses which were built to accommodate its workers, by a disused railway line,which once carried coal from the collieries west of the town to the east coast. The motorway and main line railway which bisect our block from north to south point the way to the future. Our school,which was the first to be built in the new town,is on the site of the former Sugar Hill farm.
